StarLink Class Reference

This class is a basic element of StarNetwork. It represents a link of the graph. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a basic element of StarNetwork. It represents a link of the graph.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

StarLink::StarLink ( int  nodeFrom,
int  nodeTo,
LinkFnc *  fnc 
)
Parameters
nodeFromnode ID where link comes from.
nodeTonode ID where link points to.

Member Function Documentation

void StarLink::addFlow ( FPType  flow)

Adds a specified amount of flow flow to current link flow.

Returns
current link cost function derivative value.
FPType StarLink::getFlow ( ) const
Returns
current link flow.
StarLink * StarLink::getForwardLink ( )
virtual
Returns
this pointer unless overridden by derived classes.

Reimplemented in StarLinkTolls, and StarLinkWithReverseLink.

int StarLink::getIndex ( ) const
Returns
internal link index.
LinkFnc * StarLink::getLinkFnc ( ) const
Returns
pointer to a link cost function - in some cases the derivative of the function must be evaluated without physically changing link flow.
int StarLink::getNodeFrom ( ) const
Returns
ID (ID is obtained from a file with network data) of a node where this link comes from.
int StarLink::getNodeFromIndex ( ) const
Returns
internal index (NOT ID) of a node where this link comes from.
int StarLink::getNodeTo ( ) const
Returns
ID (ID is obtained from a file with network data) of a node where this link leads to.
int StarLink::getNodeToIndex ( ) const
Returns
internal index (NOT ID) of a node where this link leads to.
FPType StarLink::getTime ( ) const
virtual
Returns
current travel time of this link.
Note
It is not automatically updated when flow changes (motivation for this is the fact that some of the algorithms now better when to update travel time).

Reimplemented in StarLinkTolls, StarLinkWithTolls, and StarLinkWithReverseLink.

void StarLink::setFlow ( FPType  flow)

Sets current link flow.

void StarLink::setFlowToZero ( )

Sets link flow to zero.

void StarLink::setIndex ( int  index)

Sets internal link index.

void StarLink::setNodeFromIndex ( int  index)

Sets internal node index of a node where this link leads to.

void StarLink::setNodeToIndex ( int  index)

Sets internal node index of a node where this link comes from.

std::string StarLink::toString ( ) const
Returns
string representation of link.
void StarLink::updateTime ( )

Updates current link travel time value and the value of link cost function derivative.
